product_info.title: ZT400 SERIES INDUSTRIAL PRINTERS
product_info.description:
--- Page 1 ---
PRODUCT SPEC SHEET
ZT400 SERIES INDUSTRIAL PRINTERS
ZT400 Series Industrial Printers
A new level of performance, versatility and ease of use
Keep your critical operations running efficiently with Zebra’s durable ZT400 Series printers. The ZT400 offers advanced technology
that drives versatility, ease of use and performance to a new level. Available in three print resolutions and two print widths, the
ZT400 Series addresses a broad array of applications throughout manufacturing, transportation and logistics, retail and more. See
printer status at a glance and manage settings quickly using the large color touch display. Field-installable linerless, connectivity,
media handling and RFID options let you easily add new features as your needs evolve. And your IT department will find ZT400
printers easy to integrate and manage, thanks to Zebra DNA™ for Printers, a suite of applications, utilities and developer tools–all
powered by Link-OS™. The result? The ZT400 offers the versatility, reliability, and performance to meet your industrial printing
needs—today and tomorrow.
Dual USB Host Ports For Added Flexibility
Dual USB Host ports allow you to directly connect a wide range
of USB device types. Use a memory stick to replicate firmware,
files and configurations, or easily print and transfer formats.
Simplify data entry by simultaneously connecting a scanner
and keyboard—with two host ports, there’s no need to plug
and unplug peripherals.
Designed to Evolve With Your Needs
You can customize the ZT400 with a range of media handling
options that can be installed in minutes. Two open media slots
accommodate additional communication options. And, the
robust processing power and memory can support firmware
upgrades and new Zebra DNA tools for years to come.
Versatile to Meet Your Evolving Needs
Enhance Productivity Sustainably With ZeroLiner
With Zebra ZeroLiner Linerless Printing Solution you can boost
Configure Your Way With Multiple Connectivity Options
productivity with up to 50% more labels per roll, minimizing
The ZT400 comes standard with Ethernet, Serial, USB, dual
downtime from roll changes and eliminating the hassle of
USB Host and Bluetooth® 4.1. Add an optional dual-band
peeling backing liners. Embrace sustainability with reduced
wireless card, now available with 802.11ax/Bluetooth 5.3 for
waste and CO2 emissions, thanks to the elimination of backing
blazing fast and reliable wireless connections on your Wi-Fi™
liners and reduced material usage. Engineered for minimal
6/6E network.
adhesive buildup, the linerless ZT411 is specifically designed
and tested for use with Zebra ZeroLiner labels and is offered in
Built to Handle a Wide Range of Media and Applications
all dpi options for many applications. The factory-installed
The ZT400 is offered in both 4 in. and 6 in. models, with 203 linerless option is direct thermal only, further reducing
dpi, 300 dpi and 600 dpi* (600 dpi available on 4 in. ZT411 environmental impact by avoiding unnecessary parts.
only). Add RFID technology to print and encode labels for Alternatively, a linerless upgrade kit is now available for
greater tracking abilities and deeper visibility. Select Zebra’s existing ZT411 printers. This field-installable kit allows for an
exclusive ZT411 RFID On-metal Tagging Solution, which is a easy conversion of your ZT411 fleet, maintaining versatility to
dedicated option for printing and encoding thicker RFID labels switch to thermal transfer printing as your needs evolve.
for metal containers and assets.
Keep your critical operations running efficiently.
For more information, visit www.zebra.com/zt400
--- Page 2 ---
Effortless to Integrate and Operate The ZT400 is powered by Link-OS, Zebra’s robust printer
operating system, and Zebra DNA for Printers, a combination
of productivity, management, development and visibility tools.
Large Color Touch Display Makes Operation a Snap
The result is a superior printing experience through better
It’s easy to set up and use the ZT400 with its intuitive
performance, simplified remote manageability and easier
icon-based interface. The 4.3-in. full-color touch display allows
integration.

icon menu system to change languages, printer settings,
Easily Manage All Your Printers—All From a Single Location
connectivity options and more. Zebra touchscreens are
With our comprehensive and flexible remote management
expertly designed and thoroughly tested with toughness and
tools, you can maintain, secure and troubleshoot printers
reliability consistent with the rest of the Zebra printer
simply and easily, from anywhere, at anytime. With Printer

Seamless Integration With Your Device Management

System

Get the simplicity of a single pane of glass to manage all of

Space-Saving Design For an Easier Fit
With Zebra DNA for Printer’s MDM Connectors, you can easily
Constructed using a bi-fold door, these printers are designed

to easily fit in space-constrained environments. ENERGY

Performance You Can Count On
Direct Connection to Your Industrial Ethernet Network
Maximum Throughput and Productivity
With the Network Connect option, you can connect ZT400
printers directly to your Industrial Ethernet network without Avoid slowdowns to your operations and processes while
any additional equipment. This eliminates vulnerability points, waiting for a label to print. Best-in-class performance provides
improves security and saves man-hours in setup, fast first label out and high throughput to make sure the label
management and troubleshooting. is ready when you need it.
Pair Devices and Access Information at a Touch Rugged Durability For Demanding Applications
With Print Touch™, you can pair ZT400 Series printers to You can count on the ZT400 Series to serve your business for
NFC-enabled devices with a simple tap. Dynamic QR codes give years. Its durable metal frame holds up in the most
you immediate access to the data you need, including Zebra demanding environments, while a long life coating protects
how-to videos and product support. the printheads when printing in direct thermal mode, reducing
the need to replace printheads. Ensure optimal print quality
Easy to Manage with the printhead element out detection feature. Every detail
has been carefully designed and tested to deliver maximum
uptime over the printer’s life—from the carbon fiber
Zebra DNA for Printers—Transforming Printers From the
reinforcing the gears to a high retention USB cable.
Inside
The printer hardware is just the start of what you need to Consistently Exceptional Zebra Certified Supplies
maximize the value of your printers.
Printing supplies can impact everything from printhead
lifespan to operational efficiency. That’s why we design,
produce, and rigorously pretest our own line of thermal
printing supplies to ensure consistent, optimized performance
in your Zebra printer—and peace of mind for you. For
industry-leading quality, service and thermal printing
expertise, choose Zebra Certified Supplies.
Maximize Uptime, Business Operations and Printer
Visibility With Services
You invest in Zebra printers to boost the efficiency of your
critical operations. Now, you can ensure predictable
performance and eliminate unbudgeted repair expenses with
Zebra OneCare. You get unmatched technical support direct
from Zebra, as well as comprehensive repair services,
including accidental damage and defined repair turn-around
times. And, Zebra’s Support and Visibility Services provide the
real-time insight into printer operational information you need
to increase printer availability and optimize utilization within
your workflows.
